mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.sys_class = #{sysClass}

SELECT
FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id WHERE u.user_id = #{id}

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.sys_class, u.salt, u.phone, u.email, u.avatar, u.dept_id, u.create_time AS ucreate_time, u.update_time AS uupdate_time, u.del_flag AS udel_flag, u.lock_flag AS lock_flag, u.dept_id AS deptId, u.sys_class, d.name AS deptName FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id
u.del_flag = '0'
and u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.username},'%')
and u.sys_class LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.sysClass},'%')
and CONCAT(u.username,u.phone,u.email) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.keyword},'%')
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
